setup-worktree: MAIN=$(git worktree list 2>/dev/null | head -1 | awk '{print $1}') && cp "$MAIN/.env.local" .env.local 2>/dev/null || true
MAIN=$(git worktree list 2>/dev/null | head -1 | awk '{print $1}') && cp "$MAIN/.env" .env 2>/dev/null || true
npx prisma migrate dev --name init 2>/dev/null || npx prisma generate 2>/dev/null || true
